name: attributeMultiple
title: Multiple Attribute Selector [name="value"][name2="value2"]
desc: Matches elements that match all of the specified attribute filters.

argument.desc: Another attribute filter, reducing the selection even more
argument.name: attributeFilter2

argument.desc: As many more attribute filters as necessary
argument.name: attributeFilterN

examples.desc: Finds all inputs that have an id attribute and whose name attribute ends with man and sets the value.
examples.html:
<input id="man-news" name="man-news" />

<input name="milkman" />
<input id="letterman" name="new-letterman" />
<input name="newmilk" />
